basics.name: Ivan Lerma
basics.label: Sr Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineer with diverse experience across various industries and organizations, with a strong focus on Front-End development and a solid foundation in Back-End technologies. Skilled in leveraging modern technologies to deliver scalable, high-quality business solutions. Adaptable and quick to integrate into new environments, continuously seeking opportunities to expand my expertise. A strong leader and communicator, passionate about solving complex problems, learning emerging technologies, and mentoring others to drive innovation

work.name: Schlumberger
work.summary: Developed features for a seismic data processing system, enabling custom workflow creation and configuration of techniques like FWI and Tomography.
highlights: Developed Ul and microservices enhancements for seamless integration of new features.
Contributed to integrating a Unity (C#) visualization tool for improved data interpretation.
Worked within an Nx monorepo architecture, using Angular, NgRx, C#, Node.js, GoLang, ADO for task management & CI/CD pipelines and deploying to a Kubernetes infrastructure.

Implemented a proof-of-concept for integrating GenAI into the system, successfully developing an AI Assistant based on RAG; validated and integrated with an Agentic Workflow by implementing Al agents capable of automating specific tasks, enhancing user operations.
Built and deployed a web and desktop version of the AI Assistant using Python, Flutter/Flet, LangChain, MilvusDB, and multiple LLMs (GPT-4, Gemini, Mistral).
Established a CI/CD pipeline and developed an ETL pipeline utilizing Azure Blob Storage and Azure Functions.
Mentored interns, guiding them in achieving their objectives and enhancing their technical skills.

work.name: Bluware
work.summary: Led the team in Front End architecture design and implementation, gathering requirements from product owners, onboarding new team members, and providing mentorship.
highlights: Worked in an Agile environment, applying SAFe methodology, ADO for project management.
Developed and maintained a seismic data visualization and interpretation system for an oil & gas company, enabling interactive exploration of terabytes of data on touch-screen interfaces.
Focused on Front End development using a tech stack that included TS with a custom UI framework based on Knockout, RxJS, Redux, D3, Underscore, SASS, and Webpack.
Contributed to .NET based C# backend completing a full integration of new features following Domain Driven Design principles.
Architected and designed a new product following a microservices approach, leading the POC implementation using React, Redux, Node.js, Python, DASK, and Flask.

work.name: Globant
work.summary: Developed and supported Portal/Dashboard to simply the management of cloud services, utilizing AngularJS, Bootstrap with LESS as CSS preprocessor, C3 chart library, Karma Jasmine, Grunt, Bower, NodeJS and Python.
highlights: Collaborated with a diverse and remote team, improving architectural design and user requirements to produce a better product.
Actively involved in technology communities around the company, sharing knowledge and discussion of the newest technologies.

work.name: Consultant
work.summary: Delivered ad hoc solutions for clients such as Bosch and Schulman.
highlights: Developed a desktop application for monitoring production line statuses, tracking operators, and visualizing scrap levels using WPF, C#, .NET, and SQL Server.
Created REST APIs and integrated them with existing ERP systems, building custom front ends with AngularJS, Bootstrap, KendoUI, and jQuery.

work.name: SmartBT
work.summary: Started as a Software Engineer contributing to the different company products and then became a Team Lead. Led team to develop a UI framework to standardize the company software development process, designed and architected an IDE for WML and WMLS.
highlights: Designed and led implementation of an IDE for WML and WMLS, simplifying and standardizing app development process for POS devices.
Built mainly with Qt C++, creating a compiler incorporating algorithms of graph theory and multiple pattern designs.
Developed a JS library based on JSON received from the BE to render the UI. Implemented jQuery widgets, HTML5 and CSS3 for company developments
